As he grew older, his passion for the art only intensified, leading him to train under the legendary Grandmaster Masutatsu Oyama in Japan.

In addition to his acting and martial arts credentials, Seagal is also a passionate advocate for environmental and humanitarian causes. In the early 2000s, he founded the Steven Seagal Japan Environmental Fund, which works to protect endangered species and preserve natural habitats in Japan.

Despite these controversies, Seagal remains a beloved figure in the action movie genre, and his films continue to be popular among fans of martial arts and action cinema.
